dataRoot.description: Optional override for where `data/` lives (defaults to repo root).

pythonBin.description: Optional path to the ComfyUI venv python for dependency verification (e.g. C:/path/to/venv/Scripts/python.exe).

torchIndexUrl.description: Optional custom package index URL used when installing torch dependencies.

torchPackages.description: Optional space-delimited torch package list used during dependency setup.
